data.comment: The match is underway at De Kuip.
At De Kuip, Damil Dankerlui has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 36, Remco Balk (Groningen) has received a yellow card from Danny Makkelie.
The first-half is over at De Kuip.
The second half has started at De Kuip.
In the minute 46, Joao Carlos Teixeira is on a sub for Mark Diemers for Feyenoord.
Goal! Feyenoord take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Lutsharel Geertruida.
Steven Berghuis with an assist there.
In the minute 61, Groningen make their first substitution with Mo El Hankouri replacing Gabriel Gudmundsson.
The away team replace Remco Balk with Joel Van Kaam.
Tomas Suslov is replacing Patrick Joosten for Groningen at De Kuip.
In the minute 67, Steven Berghuis (Feyenoord) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Dick Advocaat (Feyenoord) is making a second substitution, with Jordy Wehrmann replacing Bryan Linssen.
In the minute 84, An attacking Feyenoord player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
At De Kuip, Damil Dankerlui is shown a red card and sent off.
Goal! The home team extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a penalty from Steven Berghuis.
Groningen's Azor Matusiwa has been booked in Rotterdam.
In the minute 89, Naoufal Bannis is replacing Orkun Kokcu for the home team.
